sentences.sContent: Helicopters have been upgraded and modernized.
sentences.sCn: 直升机已经升级并且装上现代化设备。

sentences.sContent: ...the Chinese government decided to upgrade its industry...

...The figures prompted Oceana to petition the government to upgrade the level of protection for the North Atlantic loggerheads from “threatened” to “endangered”—meaning they are in danger of disappearing without additional help...
...and about the same to upgrade to a server that would enable remote staff to connect to the company networks and access all their usual resources...

remMethod.val: up(向上) ＋ grade(等级) → 使升级

trans.tranOther: to make a computer, machine, or piece of software better and able to do more things
